Just an idea:
Would it be possible to have a heritrix instance replay a cra=
wl by setting up a real crawl but instead of fetching "only" run through cr=
awl.log and by the end have heritrix generate reports as normal.

best
Bjar=
ne

hi Steve,

I meant make_reports.pl (with an s).
The version you mentionn=
ed is the one I'm testing.

I can use it and it does produce reports from c=
rawl.log but my problem
is rather the differences in the output.

nce, if I compare the two from the same crawl.log file:

recisely "make_reports.pl",
rather than "make_report.pl" (without the "s" a=
fter report)?
secondly, are you having a specific problem with the script?

if so, please describe it, and maybe we can help you figure
out the cause.
=
